titles.title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to provide that the income tax imposed on estates and trusts shall be determined using the rate table applicable to married individuals filing separate returns.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: 10/4/1994--Introduced. Amends the Internal Revenue Code to change the income tax rate table for estates and trusts to the tax rate table of married individuals filing separate returns.
